name: $any
desc: All the actions in the group must be selected as a single unit

name: $all
desc: All the actions in the group are meant to be chosen as a single unit: either all must be selected by the end user, or none may be selected

name: $all-or-none
desc: The end user must choose one and only one of the selectable actions in the group. The user may not choose none of the actions in the group

name: $exactly-one
desc: The end user may choose zero or at most one of the actions in the group

name: $at-most-one
desc: The end user must choose a minimum of one, and as many additional as desired
